Player History
Drafted in 6th round, 107th overall pick, by Pittsburgh in 1980...
Had first career hit on 4/19/1985, off Dennis Eckersley (STL)...
Hit first career homerun on 5/14/1986, off Scott McGregor (ATL)...
Signed as a free agent by Houston on 4/1/1991 to a 1-year deal worth $300,000 per year...
Signed as a free agent by Los Angeles on 2/19/1992 to a 2-year deal worth $1,900,000 per year...
Won Gold Glove Award at Catcher in 1993...
Signed as a free agent by Baltimore on 2/1/1994 to a 2-year deal worth $1,200,000 per year...
